sourceId.description: Identifier of the module or component generating the telemetry (must match config dataSources).

eventId.description: Unique identifier for the type of event (e.g., 'CORE_EXECUTION_FAILURE', 'LATENCY_SPIKE').

criticality.description: The designated severity level, directly referenced by the DifferentialCriticality sampler.

data.description: The structured payload of the telemetry event.
